script.name: !plugin.acp.fight.attack.object
script.sourceplaintext:
$dist = get script priority skip if $dist > 98 @ = [THIS] -> call script !lib.ai.ammo.supply : ship (THIS)=[THIS] victim=$victim $Countermissile = Mosquito Missile $missile.dam = get missile max damage of $Countermissile if $missile.dam > 400 $Countermissile = null else $Countermissile.Range = get range of missile type $Countermissile end
restart: $last.attack = playing time $cleanup = [FALSE] $DEFENSIVE.MFIRED.TIMEOUT = 200 $speed = [THIS] -> get current max speed
skip if $victim -> exists return null
$IsPlayer = [FALSE] skip if $victim != [PLAYERSHIP] $IsPlayer = [TRUE]
[THIS] ->set relation against $victim to Foe * setup Skills @ $my.skills = [THIS] -> call script !plugin.acp.fight.skill.std : ship=[THIS] $leader = [THIS] -> get formation leader $combat.level = [THIS] -> get pilot fightskill $Attackruntimeout = $my.skills[0] $Attackruntimeout.max = $Attackruntimeout * 4 $Defencemoveintensity = $my.skills[1] $Defencemovetimeout = $my.skills[2] $MissileSkill = $my.skills[3] $DefenceDistance = $my.skills[4] $MaxSpeed = $my.skills[5] $maxshield = [THIS] -> get maximum shield strength $vicmaxshield = $victim -> get maximum shield strength gosub set.acp.best.missile $shields.check.old = [THIS] -> get current shield strength if not random value from 0 to $combat.level - 1 inc $combat.level = [THIS] ->set pilot fightskill to $combat.level end $Has.Turrets = [THIS] -> get number of turrets do if $Has.Turrets < 2 $Has.Turrets = null
* get leader's target, or tell leader we've been attacked $leader = [THIS] -> get formation leader if $leader -> exists if $leader != [THIS] if [THIS] -> has same environment as $leader if $leader -> get local variable: name='fight.script.on.stack' $leader.victim = $leader -> get attack target do if $leader.victim -> exists $victim = $leader.victim else do if is script with prio 99 on stack $leader ->send signal SIGNAL_ATTACKED : arg1=$victim, arg2=[ACTION_ENTER_GATE], arg3=null, arg4=null end end end end
* might not have a victim! skip if $victim -> exists return null
* work out what target is. $v.is.ship = null if not $victim -> is of class Ship if not $victim -> is of class Station return null end else $v.is.ship = [TRUE] end
$station = $victim -> is of class Station $followdistance = 2000 $s1 = [THIS] -> get size of object $vic.size = $victim -> get size of object $followdistance1 = $followdistance + $s1 + $vic.size + 100 set script command target: null
$dist.sp = [THIS] -> get current max speed $dist.sp = $s1 + $vic.size / 2 + $dist.sp / 3 + 300
$ACP.action = 'ACP.action' $loop.count = 3 [THIS] ->set attack target to $victim
set script command target: $victim $NotUseTask = [THIS] -> is of class Fighter Drone skip if $NotUseTask $NotUseTask = [THIS] -> is of class Special Ship $cmd = [THIS] -> get command
* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- * Begin Main Loop while 1 $cleanup = [TRUE] @ = wait 1 ms
skip if get script command break
$secobid = [THIS] -> is in active sector
* In Sector combat, start advanced tactics if $secobid AND $combat.level AND ! $task.started AND ! $NotUseTask skip if [THIS] -> is task 30 in use [THIS] ->start task 30 with script !plugin.acp.fight.attack.tactics and prio 0: arg1=$victim arg2=$MissileSkill arg3=$cmd arg4=null arg5=null else if $task.started AND ! $secobid skip if [THIS] -> is task 30 in use $task.started = [FALSE] end
* switch target to keep atcking the player if $IsPlayer AND $victim != [PLAYERSHIP] $victim = [PLAYERSHIP] goto label restart end
gosub check.victim
* undock if nec if [THIS] -> is docked @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock : @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms continue end
$sector = $victim -> get sector * ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- * we're in the right sector if [THIS] -> is in same sector as $victim
if $victim -> is in a sector skip if [THIS] -> is target visible $victim break set script command target: $victim
* Victim is at long range $distance = get distance between [THIS] and $victim if $distance > $followdistance1 + 500 * disengage victim if it leaves scanner range $scanner.range = [THIS] -> get scanner range if $distance > $scanner.range @ do if [THIS] -> call script !lib.check.target.isescaping : Target Ship=$victim disengage distance (opt)=null break end @ $ret = [THIS] -> follow $victim with precision $followdistance m : timeout=15000 ms * possible victim is no longer valid after trying to follow (Cycrow) gosub check.victim
if $ret != FLRET_TARGETREACHED @ = wait randomly from 10 to 20 ms
* victim has moved to a new sector ? (Cycrow) gosub check.victim skip if [THIS] -> has same environment as $victim continue
* fire longrange missile $distance = get distance between [THIS] and $victim if $distance < 10000 gosub check.select.fire.missile end continue end end
Missilereturn: [THIS] ->set attack target to $victim
* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- * different tactics are used depending on if the victim is also attacking THIS if $victim == [PLAYERSHIP] $victimisattacking = get player tracking aim skip if $victimisattacking != [THIS] $iamyourtarget = 'player' skip if $victimisattacking == [THIS] $iamyourtarget = [FALSE] else if $v.is.ship $victimisattacking = $victim -> get attack target skip if $victimisattacking != [THIS] $iamyourtarget = [TRUE] skip if $victimisattacking == [THIS] $iamyourtarget = [FALSE] else $iamyourtarget = [FALSE] end
* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- * missile defence- ship will attempt to shoot down incoming missiles. * if attack fails it will try again after the loop count hits zero $incmissle = [THIS] -> find nearest missile aiming to me if $incmissle
* **InSector Only if [THIS] -> is in active sector * If it's in font of us, shoot at it do if [THIS] -> is $incmissle in firing range of turret 0 = [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $incmissle using turret 0
$distance = get distance between [THIS] and $incmissle if not $rnd.missile.att $speed = null $missletype = $incmissle -> get ware type code of object $missile.dam = get missile max damage of $missletype
* Strong ships can ignore weak missiles * slowmissile = missile still exists after trying to kill it $shieldstr = [THIS] -> get current shield strength do if $missile.dam < ( $shieldstr * 6 ) / 10 $missletype = null end
if $missletype $fireonmissile = random value from 20 to 120 - 1 if $Countermissile if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $Countermissile in cargo bay $incmissile.dam = get missile max damage of $missletype do if $distance < $Countermissile.Range AND $incmissile.dam > 1000 $firemissile = $fireonmissile + 20 end end $firemissile = $fireonmissile + $MissileSkill
if $firemissile >= 100 $firemissile = null $rnd.missile.att = random value from 5 to 15 - 1 [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$ACP.action value='no fire' @ $slowmissile = [THIS] -> call script !plugin.acp.fight.missle.def : incmissile=$incmissle the victim=$victim class of ship=$class attack run timeout=$Attackruntimeout defence move intensity=$Defencemoveintensity defence move timeout=$Defencemovetimeout skill with missiles=$MissileSkill distance in defence=$DefenceDistance [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$ACP.action value=null gosub check.victim skip if [THIS] -> is in same sector as $victim continue end
else if $slowmissile == $incmissle AND $rnd.missile.att dec $rnd.missile.att = else $slowmissile = null [THIS] ->set local variable: name='slowmissile' value=null end end end
* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- * Evasive missile attack only used against the player * after the tactic is used there is a random wait before it will use it again.. $cmd = -1 do if $v.is.ship $cmd = $victim -> get command $vicsheildpercent = $victim -> get shield percent if $iamyourtarget == 'player' AND $cmd == COMMAND_NONE AND $loop.count == 3 AND ! $def $distance = get distance between [THIS] and $victim if $distance <= $DefenceDistance $myshieldpercent = [THIS] -> get shield percent $mycurrentshield = [THIS] -> get current shield strength $victimscurrentshield = $victim -> get current shield strength skip if $defrandom $defrandom = random value from 10 to 90 - 1 if $mycurrentshield < $victimscurrentshield AND $vicsheildpercent > 15 AND $myshieldpercent < $defrandom
[THIS] ->set local variable: name=$ACP.action value='no fire' @ $def = [THIS] -> call script !plugin.acp.fight.evasive.def : the victim=$victim class of ship=$class defence move intensity=$Defencemoveintensity defence move timeout=$Defencemovetimeout skill at missiles=$MissileSkill defensive move distance=$DefenceDistance are you slower than me=$youareslowerthanme attack run timeout=$Attackruntimeout $defrandom = null gosub check.victim skip if [THIS] -> is in same sector as $victim continue end end end
* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- * Setting up attack SettingupAttack: * check to see if laser energy is low, if so then maybe do a def move to recharge * **IN Sector only if [THIS] -> is in active sector $maxlaser = [THIS] -> get maximum laser strength $currentlaser = [THIS] -> get current laser strength $temp = random value from 2 to 15 - 1 $minlaser = $maxlaser * $temp / 100 $lasrand = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 $vicsheildpercent = $victim -> get shield percent * reset defence move timeout....................... if $minlaser > $currentlaser AND $vicsheildpercent > 10 AND $fire == FLRET_FIREFREE OR ( $fire != FLRET_FIREFREE AND $lasrand < 30 ) $rnd.timeout = random value from 2000 to 8000 - 1 $temp = random value from 5 to 21 - 1 @ $fltret = [THIS] -> defensive move: type=null, intensity=$temp, timeout=$rnd.timeoutms, avoid object=null skip if $fltret != FLRET_BREAK @ = wait randomly from 10 to 20 ms continue end end
* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- * ATTACK RUN!! * **IN Sector only if [THIS] -> is in active sector if $fire != FLRET_FIREFREE AND $speed $Attack.timeout = random value from $Attackruntimeout to $Attackruntimeout.max - 1 else $Attack.timeout = $Attackruntimeout end @ $fire = [THIS] -> attack run on target $victim : timeout=$Attack.timeoutms speedlimit=$speed
* **Out Of Sector else $Attack.timeout = 60000 @ $fire = [THIS] -> attack run on target $victim : timeout=$Attack.timeout ms end
gosub check.victim skip if [THIS] -> has same environment as $victim continue
* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- * Firing! $distance = get distance between [THIS] and $victim if $fire == FLRET_FIREFREE [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$ACP.action value='fire' gosub check.select.fire.missile * Brent note: preventing laser fire when firing a missile works * extremely poorly for OOS combat, where coarse rounds mean * laser fire tends to massively outweigh missile damage. * This tweak will only do the defensive move when IS, * and allows missiles + lasers to fire in an OOS round. $secobid = [THIS] -> is in active sector if $ret.csfm AND $secobid @ = [THIS] -> defensive move: type=null, intensity=25, timeout=$DEFENSIVE.MFIRED.TIMEOUTms, avoid object=null else $playing.time = playing time if ( $last.attack + $ret.nextatk ) <= $playing.time if [THIS] -> is in active sector = [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $victim using turret null else = [THIS] -> fire all turrets on target: $victim, next target filter=Ship end $last.attack = playing time end end
gosub check.victim
* or not Firing!? else if $fire == FLRET_BREAK @ = wait randomly from 10 to 50 ms gosub check.victim
* Target has disappeared (not destroyed)! * do we really want to just sit around waiting for it to return if their are * other enemies around? if not [THIS] -> is target visible $victim skip if is script with prio 99 on stack $i = random value from 20 to 130 - 1
while not [THIS] -> is target visible $victim $idletime = random value from 3000 to 6000 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> move around $idletime ms gosub check.victim
skip if $i > 0 break dec $i = end end
end * End of attack run
gosub check.victim
* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- * Opportunistic fire * if there's another target under our crosshairs, fire on that too $secobid = [THIS] -> is in active sector if $secobid $t.victim = [THIS] -> find enemy in firing range of turret 0 if $t.victim $vic.tmp = $victim $victim = $t.victim gosub check.select.fire.missile $victim = $vic.tmp if $ret.csfm @ = [THIS] -> defensive move: type=null, intensity=25, timeout=$DEFENSIVE.MFIRED.TIMEOUTms, avoid object=null else if [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $t.victim using turret null [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$ACP.action value='fire' else [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$ACP.action value='no fire' end end else [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$ACP.action value='no fire' end else [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$ACP.action value='no fire' end end dec $loop.count = skip if $loop.count > 0 $loop.count = 3 else $ret = random value from 5000 to 10000 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> move around $ret ms end
* ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- else * If follow into next sector is set skip if $follow break * $sector = get next sector on route from sector [SECTOR] to sector $sector if $sector * = [THIS]-> fly to sector $sector @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetonextsector : sector=$sector destination=$victim else @ = [THIS] -> move around 60000 ms end @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms end
end * End of Main Loop * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- * tidy up before ending cleanup.end: if $cleanup [THIS] ->set attack target to null set script command target: null if [OWNER] != Player do if [THIS] -> can be controlled by race logic [THIS] ->set relations from notoriety: include player as target and race > teladi as owner=[FALSE] end [THIS] ->set local variable: name=$ACP.action value=null @ = wait 1 ms end return null
* -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- set.acp.best.missile: if not $no.bestmissile @ $bestmissile = [THIS] -> call script !lib.get.best.missile.fortarget : Target=$victim Set Missile Fire Time Diff=[TRUE] skip if $bestmissile $no.bestmissile = [TRUE] gosub check.victim [THIS] ->set local variable: name='acp.best.missile' value=$bestmissile end endsub
check.select.fire.missile: * check that we have a missile to fire, time is right to fire, and have fired. * if we've run out of bestmissile, find next best missile * RET.csfm will only be true if we fired a missile * checks if attacking the shields only (Cycrow) $ret.csfm = [FALSE] $done = [FALSE] $ret.nextatk = 0
if $onlyShields @ $shield.max = [THIS] -> call script !lib.get.shieldthreshold : the victim=$victim $shield.percent = $victim -> get shield percent if $shield.percent <= $shield.max $ret.csfm = [TRUE] $done = [TRUE] else if $shield.percent < 30 $ret.nextatk = 2 $done = [TRUE] else if $shield.percent < 50 $ret.nextatk = 1 $done = [TRUE] end end
if ! $done $shields.check = [THIS] -> get current shield strength if [THIS] -> get local variable: name='acp.best.missile' if [THIS] -> should a missile be fired
if $shields.check >= $shields.check.old $bestmissile = [THIS] -> get local variable: name='acp.best.missile' if [THIS] -> get amount of ware $bestmissile in cargo bay
if [THIS] -> is missile $bestmissile ready to fire $miss.range = get range of missile type $bestmissile $dist = get distance between [THIS] and $victim if $miss.range > $dist if [THIS] -> fire missile $bestmissile on $victim $ret.csfm = [TRUE] end end end
else gosub set.acp.best.missile end end
end end $shields.check.old = $shields.check end endsub return null
check.victim: skip if $victim -> exists gosub cleanup.end if not [THIS] -> is $victim a enemy gosub cleanup.end end endsub return null
* Gazz 23.11.11: added calls for OOS laser fire + ammo / missile supply * Deleted useless section about targeting missiles OOS. * v49: Smarter use of countermissiles

comment.var: setup Skills
get leader's target, or tell leader we've been attacked
might not have a victim!
work out what target is.
Begin Main Loop
In Sector combat, start advanced tactics
switch target to keep atcking the player
undock if nec
we're in the right sector
Victim is at long range
disengage victim if it leaves scanner range
possible victim is no longer valid after trying to follow (Cycrow)
victim has moved to a new sector ? (Cycrow)
fire longrange missile
different tactics are used depending on if the victim is also attacking THIS
missile defence- ship will attempt to shoot down incoming missiles.
if attack fails it will try again after the loop count hits zero

line.text: find nearest missile aiming to me

comment.var: **InSector Only
If it's in font of us, shoot at it

line.text: get ware type code of object

comment.var: Strong ships can ignore weak missiles
slowmissile = missile still exists after trying to kill it
Evasive missile attack only used against the player
after the tactic is used there is a random wait before it will use it again..
Setting up attack
check to see if laser energy is low, if so then maybe do a def move to recharge
**IN Sector only
reset defence move timeout.......................
ATTACK RUN!!
**IN Sector only
**Out Of Sector
Firing!
Brent note: preventing laser fire when firing a missile works
extremely poorly for OOS combat, where coarse rounds mean
laser fire tends to massively outweigh missile damage.
This tweak will only do the defensive move when IS,
and allows missiles + lasers to fire in an OOS round.
or not Firing!?
Target has disappeared (not destroyed)!
do we really want to just sit around waiting for it to return if their are
other enemies around?
End of attack run
Opportunistic fire
if there's another target under our crosshairs, fire on that too

line.text: find enemy in firing range of turret

comment.var: If follow into next sector is set
$sector = get next sector on route from sector [SECTOR] to sector $sector
= [THIS]-> fly to sector $sector
End of Main Loop
tidy up before ending

line.text: can be controlled by race logic
set relations from notoriety: include player as target and race > teladi as owner=

checks if attacking the shields only (Cycrow)
